current_contact.agency: San Bernardino County Sheriff Department - Coroner Division

case_circumstances: "John Doe #27-86" was found dead in an advanced state of decomposition in a vacant house in Ontario, California on August 21, 1986.  He had been dead between several days to a week, and had died as a result of injuries sustained in a beating.  He is described as a White male, approximately 17-22 years old, 5'8"¬ù, medium build (140 lbs), with light brown hair. He would have had a very distinctive smile, as his upper left central incisor (the left of his two front teeth) was missing, possibly from birth - leaving a gap. Facial reconstruction created by NCMEC.  D
